author: valsdav
body:
#### PR description:

This PR introduces a quick fix to prevent Tensorflow from using the GPU by default. 
This is needed to be able to compile TF with GPU support in the cmssw-dist (see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/7648), but without causing problems with the allocation of Cuda memory to other producers (not using TF).

A more sophisticated way to control the GPU use and memory limitation will be discussed and introduced in a later PR.

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py -j 4 --job-reports -w gpu -l 11634.512` run without issues.


@yongbinfeng @riga  @tvami @smuzaffar
title: Prevent Tensorflow from using GPU by default
